EmailTemplate.subject: AERO Patent Watch - July 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Title July 2015
Please find a link to the Aero Patent Watch – July 2015. The Aero Patent Watch provides a monthly view of published or granted patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark office by Honeywell or peer companies in our area of interest (Direct Link to Patents by Assignee).
As new issues are released, prior issues are moved to the Archive <http://goaero.honeywell.com/o02MZ00a90056Q06RXIGvq0" target="_blank" title="Archive"><span style=> section. Additional Aero IP processes and background information is available at the Aero IP Community Wiki. <http://goaero.honeywell.com/x0Q000092N50qZI0bG66RXv" target="_blank" title="Aero IP Community Wiki"><span style=>
In this edition, product line classification has been renamed to align with Aerospace Gold Enterprises:
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thank you, Dan Dan Gutfreund IP Process Leader Aerospace, Advanced Technology, Technology Strategy 21111 N 19th Ave (M/S 2J35A5) Phoenix, AZ 85027 Phone: +1 602 436-9030 Mobile: +1 480 258-8692 Dan.Gutfreund@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/CI600T0bq0uQ0ZGR2v04X06> Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2015 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
